reviews.review:
Игра полная ХУЕТА, Я ИГРАЛ В НЕЕ КОГДА МНЕ БЫЛО 7 лет, игра устарела! Скуычнейший геймплей, предлагаю удалить кнопку "W", так как все ходят на shift, короче ГЕЙБ если ты читаешь это через переводчик.
Я тебе сам переведу нахуй сука все блядина ебаная. Скажу я тебе одно:GABE WENT FOUND THE FUCKER FUCKING, your life shit is a fat creature!
I keep playing this game so I guess im a masochist
Great Game, they need to work on ranking system since i was on a 23 game win streak and i stayed the same rank

Best multiplayer game I've ever played.
nice game but everyone who kills me is clearly using the cheetz
its okay, still kinda weird you have to hip fire?

Its one of the best competitive FPS game. It needs a lot of practice & patience to learn and build up your skill. You'll need to have good aim, game sense & patience along with regular practice, if you want to get better at it. But when you master this game, any other FPS game will be a piece of cake for you. Each weapon has different recoil pattern, RoF and has ways to handle them that you'll need to learn in order to get better.
As for the bad side, the community is toxic, the ranked matchmaking is bad & then there are hackers. Other than that, its a good game. Also met my first egirl in this game. We had a blast playing comp together. At the end of the game I finally got the guts to ask her for her discord. Luckily she gave it to me and I was horny af. We talked on discord and we became very close with each other, I even started buying her skins, uber eats, gucci. She one day told me she needed to tell me something important so I hopped on a call with her and to my surprise it was a dude.
neden bedave oldu la hile artti
A good continuation of the series. Deceptively complex competitive shooter.
